channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Ansible Tower
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Ansible Tower

item.title: CVE-2020-10782|2024-08-04T11:14:15.612Z -- red%20hat -- ansible%20tower
item.description: An exposure of sensitive information flaw was found in Ansible version 3.7.0. Sensitive information, such tokens and other secrets could be readable and exposed from the rsyslog configuration file, which has set the wrong world-readable permissions. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality. This is fixed in Ansible version 3.7.1.
